logIn.title: Welcome back!
logIn.description: Enter your email and password to access your account.

signUp.title: Hello new friend!
signUp.description: Enter your account information here, and click Sign up.

verifyOTP.title: Verification Code

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Please enter your email address. You will receive an OTP to reset a new password.
